```{r}
head(gdp_data)
names(gdp_data)[1] <- "Country.Name"
colnames(gdp_data)
```


```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
gdp_data2 <- gdp_data[,-c(5:34)]
```

```{r}
clean_gdp <- gdp_data2 %>%
  filter(X2007 != "")
```

```{r}
clean_gdp %>%
  ggplot(aes(Country.Name, X2017)) + geom_point()
```
